Name: Dinesh Gundu Rao
Tweet: UP CM Adityanath has been severely indicted by the High Court. @narendramodi should dismiss the incompetent CM. Using the name of Ram & preaching Dharma is no use if you are actually practising Adharma. Being a Yogi means you should be saintlike.   https://t.co/Zhk1p1RzAn
